meanings.sent1: The old car would cronk loudly as it struggled up the hill.
meanings.sent2: I heard the engine cronk as it sputtered to a stop.
meanings.sent3: The frog tried to cronk like a broken toy.
meanings.sent4: The rusty gate would cronk open and closed in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The crow's cronk echoed through the quiet forest.

meanings.sent1: The cronk of the frog filled the night air.
meanings.sent2: I woke up to the cronk of a distant horn.
meanings.sent3: The old radio made a strange cronk before turning on.
meanings.sent4: The cronk of the old pipes reminded me of a sad song.
meanings.sent5: The cronk of the crow signaled the coming storm.
